Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Spray copper-based bactericides weekly. Remove infected leaves immediately.
Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.dosage: Copper fungicide 2-3 grams per liter of water, spray every 7 days.
Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use certified disease-free seeds, avoid overhead irrigation, maintain field hygiene.

Pepper__bell___healthy.prevention: Maintain proper watering, balanced fertilization, and regular monitoring.

Potato___Early_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil or mancozeb.
Potato___Early_blight.dosage: Mancozeb 2-2.5 grams per liter every 7-10 days.
Potato___Early_blight.prevention: Rotate crops yearly and remove infected debris.

Potato___Late_blight.dosage: Metalaxyl 2 grams per liter every 7 days during outbreak.
Potato___Late_blight.prevention: Ensure good drainage and avoid excess moisture.

Potato___healthy.prevention: Use certified seed tubers and proper spacing.

Tomato_Bacterial_spot.prevention: Avoid leaf wetness and use resistant varieties.

Tomato_Early_blight.treatment: Apply fungicide containing mancozeb or chlorothalonil.
Tomato_Early_blight.prevention: Crop rotation and removal of infected leaves.

Tomato_Late_blight.dosage: 2 grams per liter every 7 days during infection.
Tomato_Late_blight.prevention: Improve air circulation and avoid overwatering.

Tomato_Septoria_leaf_spot.prevention: Remove lower infected leaves and avoid splashing water.

Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m.dosage: Neem oil 5 ml per liter weekly.
Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m.prevention: Maintain field hygiene and monitor leaf undersides.

Tomato__Target_Spot.prevention: Ensure good air circulation and remove infected debris.

Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.treatment: No direct cure. Control whiteflies immediately.
Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.dosage: Imidacloprid 0.5 ml per liter every 10 days.
Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.prevention: Use resistant varieties and insect-proof nets.

Tomato__Tomato_mosaic_virus.treatment: No chemical cure available. Remove infected plants.
Tomato__Tomato_mosaic_virus.prevention: Disinfect tools and avoid tobacco contamination.
